text:
Suppose you have these two actions in a jsp page :

<jsp:include page="Included.jsp" flush="true" />
<jsp:forward page="Forwarded.jsp" />

the jsp:forward should trigger an IllegalStateException (see JSP Spec par 4.5)

JFH
